open cmd

cd to this folder

type following:

image_to_c64.exe 'filename'.gif > 'filename'.h



example:

cd C:\Users\mshah\OneDrive\Desktop\MyGif\image_to_c-master\image_to_c-master\dist\Windows

image_to_c64.exe fire.gif > fire.h




Note:
put the .gif file in (image_to_c-master\image_to_c-master\dist\Windows) folder for conversion to .h file
